name: Endless Vengeance
description:
Basic Description:

Endless Vengeance is based in Medieval France and takes place inside of a castle. The player plays as Jean, a knight who’s family was murdered during an invasion when he was a child. Now the kingdom is once again under attack and Jean is the chosen one to protect what his father wasn’t able to. Endless Vengeance, a survival action platformer. Your job is to save the kingdom from being taken over by Ghouls. Survive and destroy countless rounds of Ghouls as you work to defeat the final boss and save the kingdom!

Gameplay:

The player, Jean, must make it through 10 rounds of Ghouls before taking on the final boss, each round will become increasingly difficult with stronger ghouls who are able to withstand more damage. Jean can have up to  3 hearts at a time, each time he takes damage he loses half a heart. Some Ghouls will drop a heart for Jean to pickup. If Jean loses all of his hearts the game will end and the player will have to restart from round 1.
